TITLE: Chinese companies offer to 'resurrect' deceased loved ones with AI avatars

TITLE: Bangladesh's top court scales back jobs quota after deadly clashes with protesters
SUMMARY: Students clash with riot police during a protest against a quota system for government jobs, in Dhaka, Bangladesh, Thursday, July 18, 2024

TITLE: Landslides caused by heavy rains kill at least 70 in southern India
SUMMARY: This photograph provided by National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) shows rescuers at a spot after a landslide in Wayanad, southern Kerala state, India, on Tuesday

TITLE: Beats for Buddhism: A South Korean DJ spins followers to the faith

TITLE: "We are hungry!" Nigerians Protest Soaring Food and Fuel Costs

TITLE: Every ceremony at India's star-studded Ambani wedding, explained
SUMMARY: Nita Ambani, wife of Asia's richest man, Mukesh Ambani, arrives holding a lamp with an image of elephant-headed Hindu god Ganesha, for the wedding of their youngest son, Anant Ambani in Mumbai on Friday

TITLE: A North Korean diplomat in Cuba defects to South Korea
SUMMARY: A TV screen shows a file image of Ri Il Kyu, a senior North Korea diplomat based in Cuba, during a news program at Seoul Railway Station in Seoul, South Korea, on Tuesday. South Korea's spy agency said Ri has fled to South Korea, the latest in a series of defections by members of the North's ruling elite in recent years
